data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a CSKA Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
Ivan Ignatyev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 4, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 12, Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Nikola Vlasic fires in a strike for CSKA Moscow.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for CSKA Moscow, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Denis Makarov (Rubin Kazan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets in a shot on goal at Kazan Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Ilya Samoshnikov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 16, In Kazan Rubin Kazan drive forward through Denis Makarov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Vitaly Meshkov waits before resuming play because Baktiyor Zaynutdinov for CSKA Moscow is still down.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 20, Baktiyor Zaynutdinov is back on his feet again.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Kazan Arena.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
In the minute 21, In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nikola Vlasic for CSKA Moscow drives towards goal at Kazan Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 22, Fedor Chalov of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Kazan.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 29, Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow.
CSKA Moscow's Ivan Oblyakov misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 32, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Fedor Chalov's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In the minute 34, In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In the minute 37, CSKA Moscow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
CSKA Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Denis Makarov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Kazan.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivan Oblyakov (CSKA Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 47, Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, At Kazan Arena, Darko Jevtic has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Georgi Zotov (Rubin Kazan) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 51, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Ivan Ignatyev gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ivan Oblyakov for CSKA Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in high up the field for CSKA Moscow in Kazan.
Rubin Kazan needs to be cautious. CSKA Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
The home team have replaced Ivan Ignatyev with Djordje Despotovic. This is the first substitution made today by Leonid Slutskiy.
In the minute 56, The home team replace Darko Jevtic with Hwang In-beom.
Rubin Kazan make their third substitution with Aleksandr Zuev replacing Soltmurad Bakaev.
Nikola Vlasic (CSKA Moscow) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 57, CSKA Moscow's Konstantin Maradishvili gets in a shot on goal at Kazan Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Goal! Rubin Kazan take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Djordje Despotovic.
In the minute 58, Great play from Oliver Abildgaard to set up the goal.
Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's first substitution at Kazan Arena with Arnor Sigurdsson replacing Ilzat Akhmetov.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Djordje Despotovic for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Vitaly Meshkov and receives a first yellow card.
CSKA Moscow's Nikola Vlasic breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ilya Samoshnikov (Rubin Kazan) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Nikola Vlasic (CSKA Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 69, CSKA Moscow's Arnor Sigurdsson misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Adolfo Gaich is replacing Chidera Ejuke for CSKA Moscow at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 69, Kristijan Bistrovic is on a sub for Fedor Chalov for CSKA Moscow.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
In the minute 70, Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside CSKA Moscow's half?
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to CSKA Moscow just outside Rubin Kazan's area.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a CSKA Moscow defender.
In the minute 76, Oleg Shatov of Rubin Kazan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Baktiyor Zaynutdinov's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 78, Vitaly Meshkov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Igor Diveev (CSKA Moscow) has received a yellow card from Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 80, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 81, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kirill Klimov is replacing Djordje Despotovic for the home team.
Rubin Kazan's Aleksandr Zuev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vitaly Meshkov awards CSKA Moscow a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Nayair Tiknizyan is on a sub for Georgi Schennikov for CSKA Moscow.
The away team replace Ivan Oblyakov with Ilia Shkurin.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 85, CSKA Moscow's Konstantin Maradishvili has been booked in Kazan.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 88, In Kazan CSKA Moscow attack through Kristijan Bistrovic. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Kazan Arena.
CSKA Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rubin Kazan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vitaly Meshkov will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Igor Diveev's header is off-target for CSKA Moscow.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Oleg Shatov (Rubin Kazan) has received a yellow card from Vitaly Meshkov.
Kirill Klimov for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Vitaly Meshkov and receives a first yellow card.
Rubin Kazan's Silvije Begic has been booked in Kazan.
